DOC.brief_summary: This randomize study examine efficacy , safety acceptability misoprostol treatment incomplete abortion . Women diagnose incomplete abortion randomize receive one follow regimen : In Tanzania Mozambique : 1 . 600 mcg oral misoprostol one dose , 2 . Standard surgical treatment ( MVA ) In Moldova Madagascar : 1 . 600 mcg oral misoprostol one dose , 2 . 400 mcg sublingual misoprostol one dose . In Burkina Faso Vietnam : 1 . 400 mcg sublingual misoprostol one dose . We hypothesize treatment incomplete abortion either 400 mcg sublingual misoprostol , 600 mcg oral misoprostol MVA equally effective evacuate uterus .

In Tanzania : 18 year age parental permission In Mozambique : 21 year age parental permission In Moldova : 18 year age In Madagascar : 18 year age parental permission In Vietnam : reproductive age Contraindications study drug ; Uterine size large 12 week L.M.P . time presentation care . Signs severe infection , define least one following : 1. foul smell discharge , 2. fever > 39 degree C , 3. pulse > 110/min ;
